PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Realizadas na Semana
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO and A.DATACONCLUSAO BETWEEN @SEMANA[1] AND @SEMANA[2] </CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividades</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Realizadas na Semana</Description> <Icon>fa fa-cog fa-spin</Icon> <Color>green</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Pendentes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO < @HOJE</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesPendentes</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Pendentes</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>red</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades para hoje
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO >= DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE()),0) AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO < DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE())+1,0)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesHoje</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades para hoje</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>green-jungle</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Futuras
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO > DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE())+1,0)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesFuturas</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Futuras</Description> <Icon>fa fa-line-chart</Icon> <Color>blue</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Chamados Pendentes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_HD_CHAMADOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS NOT IN (342,340,339) AND A.SISCON IS NOT NULL</CriteriaWhereClause> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Chamados Pendentes</Description> <Icon>fa fa-phone</Icon> <Color>green</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>
